name: My College Options Inc.
description: Provider of an online college advisory platform. The company's online college advisory platform uses individual student academic performance and psychometric data, enabling high school students to find and gather information about schools and colleges before applying for admission.
one_liner: Provider of an online college advisory platform. The company's online college advisory platform uses individual student academic performance and psychometric data, enabling high school students to find and gather information about schools and colleges before applying for admission.
